long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Android Messages Quick Copy Extension

Quickly and easily copy your Ticket Master Codes for Verified Fans or any other service that uses the 6 digit and text format.

Uses Android Messages for web, will parse any conversation looking for 6 digits next to text

"848484 this is your Ticketmaster Code."
"This is your code 848484" 

For these formats the codes will be automatically copied into the extension's storage cache, then displayed in the extension. Once you click the code, it will copy your code to the clipboard and delete the code from the extension. The codes will not reappear on refresh of the page.

WARNING: the extension will not show repeated codes, as it has built in checks to not repeat already parsed codes again.
